topic.title: HP Helion Public Cloud Monitoring Overview

body.p: HP Helion Public Cloud Monitoring provides you with a managed service that facilitates monitoring usage and performance metrics about your cloud. Since it is a pre-built framework, you can just turn it on and go!

section.title: API
section.p: Do you need low-level, raw REST API access to HP Helion Public Cloud Monitoring? Take a look at the Monitoring v1.1 API page.
